data.text: Nɨ gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amibar arazibagh ifueghan markɨ. Egh men poghsɨ nɨghnɨghan markɨ.
Guizbangɨra, me gumazamizibagh asɨghasɨghasa nɨghnigha, zurara osɨmtɨzibar amutɨ da otivamin arazibav gei.
Gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko fofozim itim, a dɨpenir aghuimɨn ikɨtɨ, an amuiroghboriba gavgavigh ikiam.
Kamagh garir gumazim, a bizir aghuir avɨrir bar pɨn kozibagh ivezegh uan dɨpenimɨn dar arigham.
Gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko fofozim itim, a gumazir gavgaviba itim. Nɨghnɨzir aghuim bar deragha gumazir gavgavimɨn arazim gafira.

Guizbangɨra, atrivim nguibar igharazim ko mɨsoghsɨ, a faragh gumazir mɨdorozimɨn arazibagh fozim da nɨghnɨzim inigham. Atrivim, gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba a danɨngamin avɨriba ikɨtɨ, a mɨdorozim gafiragham.

Nɨghnɨzir aghuim bar pɨn kogha, gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba puvatɨzimɨn nɨghnɨzim a gafira. Gumazamiziba apiaghav ikia bizir ekiaba bagh akabav sosi, ezɨ gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuim puvatɨzim, puram akam dukuagha aperaghav iti.
Gumazir arazir kuram damuasa nɨghnɨzir avɨribagh amim, me a dɨpon suam, osɨmtɨzibagh amir gumazim.

Gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba puvatɨziba, me arazir derazir puvatɨzibar amuasa nɨghnɨsi, ezɨ arazir kaba bar arazir kuraba. Ezɨ gumazamiziba, dɨbovir akabav geir gumazimɨn gara ghaze, a gumazir kuram, e bar an aghua.
Dughiar kuram nɨ batoghtɨ, nɨn agharir suiaba amɨraghtɨ, nɨ guizbangɨra gavgaviba puvatɨgham.
Kot pazɨ mɨkɨm suam, me gumazim mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham, nɨ uamategh mangɨ gumazir kam uam a inigh an akurvagham.

Nɨ kamaghɨn mɨkɨman kogh suam, “Kɨ bizir kam gɨfozir puvatɨ. Kar nan bizim puvatɨ.” Puvatɨgham. Ikiavɨra Itir God deravɨram nɨn gara, bar deravɨram nɨn nɨghnɨziba tuisɨsi. Egha a nɨn akar kamɨn mɨngarim gɨfo. Egh a gumazamiziba amizir araziba bagh vaghvagh me ikarvagh ivezim me danɨngam.
Nan borim, nɨ hanibar amɨ. A bar nɨn akamɨn isɨngi.
Ezɨ nɨ kamaghɨn foghasa kɨ ifonge, nɨghnɨzir aghuim a uaghan deragha bar isɨngi. Eghtɨ nɨ a inigh, gɨn dughiar aghuim batogh, egh zuamɨram aremeghan kogham.
Nɨ gumazir kuramɨn mɨn modogh, gumazir aghuimɨn dɨpenimɨn ganɨva, an dɨpenim akarigh an biziba okɨman markɨ.
Guizbangɨra, gumazir aghuim dughiar avɨribar daighiri, egha zurara ua dɨkafi. Eghtɨ dughiar kuram gumazir arazir kurabagh amiba batoghtɨ, me bar ikuvigham.
Nɨ uan apanimɨn gantɨ, dughiar kuram a batoghtɨ, nɨ bar akueghan markɨ. A uan dagarim bizitam gasegh irɨsɨ damutɨ, nɨ an ingarvakan markɨ.
Nɨ kamaghɨn damutɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God nɨn gantɨma nɨ bar akueghtɨ, a navir kuram nɨn ikɨva egh nɨn apanir kamɨn ataran kogham.
Nɨ mɨghɨgh gumazir arazir kurabagh amibar arazibagh nɨghnɨghan markɨ. Egh uaghan men arazibagh ifueghan markɨ.
Guizbangɨra, gumazir kaba me dughiar aghuim bativan kogham. Me lamɨn avim mungezɨ moghɨn, arɨghiregham.
Nan borim, nɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn apengan ikɨva atrivimɨn apengan ikɨ. Egh nɨ gumazamizir Ikiavɨra Itir God ko atrivim, aningɨn akaba batoziba, men saghon ikɨ.
Guizbangɨra, gumazamizir kamagh gariba, me zuamɨra ikuvigham. Ezɨ e fozir puvatɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God ko atrivim, osɨmtɨzir manam me danɨngam.
Gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba itiba, akar kamɨn gun mɨkeme. Gumaziba kotɨn izima, kotiaba tuisɨzir gumazim akurvazim marazi danɨng egh marazi dɨkabɨnam, arazir kam bar ikufi.
Ezɨ gumazir arazir kuram gamizim, me a kot datɨghtɨ, jas aneteghtɨ a pura mangɨtɨ, kantrin gumazamiziba bar jasɨn kam gifueghan koghɨva, akar kurabar a mɨkɨmam.
Eghtɨ jas gumazir arazir kuram gamizim ivezir kuram a danigham, jas deraghvɨra ikɨ bizir avɨrir aghuiba iniam.
Gumazitam, guizbangɨn akam nɨ ikara, a guizbangɨra nɨn namakam.
Nɨ faragh uan azenibar ingarigh dagheba oparigh, egh gɨn dɨpenimɨn ingar.
Nɨ kotɨn guizbangɨra mɨkɨm, egh gumazir arazir kuram gamizir puvatɨzim gifaragh puram a mɨkɨmɨva a dɨkabɨnan markɨ.
Egh nɨ kamaghɨn mɨkɨman markɨ, “Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn arazir kuramɨn a ikaragham. Egh a na gamizir arazir kamra kɨ a damuam.”
Dughiar mam, kɨ arua ghua gumazir mamɨn dagher azenim ko wainɨn azenimɨn gari. Gumazir kam a nɨghnɨzir aghuiba puvatɨ, egha gumazir amɨrazim.
Ezɨ ogher kuram ko dɨkonir beniba dagher azenir kamɨn ave. Ezɨ dagɨar dɨvazir azenir kam avɨnizim, a dɨpɨriaghirɨgha irɨ.
Ezɨ kɨ dagher azenir kamɨn ganigha, nɨghnɨzir avɨribagh amua, fofozir aghuim ini.
24:33-34 Aghuzir Akaba 6:10-11Guizbangɨra, gumazamizir amɨraziba ghaze, “A dera, kɨ tong dakuigham. Kɨ dughiar ovezimɨn tong avughsegh ikɨ mangɨ egh gɨn ua dɨkavigham.”
Nɨ kamaghɨn damutɨ, nɨn biziba ko dagheba zuamɨra gɨvaghtɨ, nɨ gumazir onganarazibagh amimɨn mɨn otogham. Mati okɨmakɨar gumazim nɨn biziba bar da okeme.
